Package wt.query.template

Provides generic support for saved report queries using ReportTemplate and various methods in ReportTemplateHelper for executing and generating reports.

See: Description

Package wt.query.template Description

Provides generic support for saved report queries using ReportTemplate and various methods in ReportTemplateHelper for executing and generating reports.

The Reporting QueryBuilder Model provides detailed information that is useful for building QueryBuider report queries for classes related to ReportTemplate.

The QueryBuilder app provides access to model documentation. The documentation is provided via directives in configuration files. Fore more information on providing these directives, see QueryBuilder Documentation Configuration.
